name: There,
greetingText: - I really like your name btw!
wishText: Hope this message finds you in good health and spirits.;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy returns of the day .....
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
replayText: On your special day today, my friend, I wanted to do something a little different. I thought that this year I'd send you a heartfelt message to let you know just how meaningful you are to me. Over the years you have become so much more to me than simply just a friend. The truth is, I see you now as more of a brother than a buddy.  Happy birthday, and always know that Iâ€™m truly very grateful to have someone like you in my life.
